mapper.select: SELECT concat(month(STR_TO_DATE(left(pay_date,10),"%Y-%m-%d")),"월",day(STR_TO_DATE(left(pay_date,10),"%Y-%m-%d")),"일") as day, sum(pay_price) as income FROM tbl_shop_payment where (STR_TO_DATE(left(pay_date,10),"%Y-%m-%d")) between date_add(now(),interval -30 day) and now() GROUP BY STR_TO_DATE(left(pay_date,10),"%Y-%m-%d");

select c.prod_name, sum(b.cart_pqty) as total from tbl_shop_order a left join tbl_shop_cart b on a.cart_no = b.cart_no left join tbl_shop_product c on b.cart_pid = c.prod_id group by b.cart_pid order by sum(b.cart_pqty) desc limit 5
